alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and northern Lee Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cape Coral, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Babcock Webb Wma, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, McGregor, Pine Manor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga and Charlotte County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
